thread.title: Get in touch: Telegraph Business Events
thread.title_full: Get in touch: Telegraph Business Events - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Get in touch: Telegraph Business Events
text: Find out more about Innovate in Brasil » The Telegraph Business Events division has been created to provide a live platform for Telegraph business communities to share knowledge, debate important issues and drive business strategy and innovation. Through the Telegraph’s reach, reader profile and editorial expertise, Telegraph Business Events works with industry experts to explore some of the world’s most significant economies. Our portfolio delivers world-class programmes – chaired by senior journalists from the Telegraph, government leaders and senior heads of industry – that will help shape policy, inspire innovation and facilitate target-led networking for organisations serious about doing business. Telegraph Business Events is committed to producing outstanding, market-driven events that assist innovation and support industry growth across multiple sectors. Conference enquiries Christina Grigor christina.grigor@telegraph.co.uk Speaking opportunities Jessica Jones jessica.jones@telegraph.co.uk Marketing enquiries Soosyan Eng soosyan.eng@telegraph.co.uk Telegraph Media Group 111 Buckingham Palace Road London SW1W 0SR
